bioghist.p: John A. Peterson, of Grand Marais, Mich., served with Company B, 339th U.S. Infantry, during the American intervention of Archangel, Russia, the Polar Bear Expedition.

scopecontent.p: The John Peterson papers consists of photocopies of military discharge papers and other official documents and a 1960 invitation to Polar Bear reunion and also a photograph of Peterson in uniform.
